CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD(Stage_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, (Stage_Start__c) + Duration_Days__c + FLOOR((Duration_Days__c -1)/5)*2, 1, (Stage_Start__c) + Duration_Days__c + FLOOR((Duration_Days__c)/5)*2, 2, (Stage_Start__c) + Duration_Days__c + FLOOR((Duration_Days__c +1)/5)*2, 3, (Stage_Start__c) + Duration_Days__c + FLOOR((Duration_Days__c +2)/5)*2, 4, (Stage_Start__c) + Duration_Days__c + FLOOR((Duration_Days__c +3)/5)*2, 5, (Stage_Start__c) + Duration_Days__c + CEILING((Duration_Days__c)/5)*2, 6, (Stage_Start__c) - IF(Duration_Days__c > 0,1,0) + Duration_Days__c + CEILING((Duration_Days__c)/5)*2, null)
CustomField.label: Stage End
